message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you at a price of $18,000.  I believe it presents a great opportunity at this price point.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is my bottom line.  I'm confident you won't find a better deal for this elsewhere.
